amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding for the Southeast Crescent Regional Commission to FY19 levels.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Southeast Crescent Regional Commission to FY19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 299 (Roll no. 541).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 122 - 299 (Roll no. 541).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
